text: The Ayer Keroh Lake () is a lake in Ayer Keroh, Melaka, Malaysia. ==Facilities== The lake offers various activities such as sailing, canoeing, boat riding or fishing. It also has jogging path, playground and food stalls. ==See also== * Geography of Malaysia * List of tourist attractions in Melaka * List of lakes of Malaysia ==References== Category:Geography of Malacca
title: Ayer Keroh Lake
